name: Ninja Rush (IcyPigs)
description:
Ninja Rush is a action game where you jump around an arena throwing shuriken's at other Ninjas and Monsters. Be careful though because they will also be shooting at you!
This is a highscore based game. There is no end/winning screen, your only goal is to get as high a score you can!

Ninja Rush is my first game using Construct 3. Also its one of my first games. (Being my first to upload on Itch) Hope you enjoy!
